mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT qi.QI_PRO_LOT_ID as lotID FROM QUALITY_INSPECTION qi WHERE qi.QI_PRO_LOT_ID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY qi.QI_PRO_LOT_ID
SELECT DISTINCT qi.QI_PI_ID as processID FROM QUALITY_INSPECTION qi WHERE qi.QI_PI_ID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY qi.QI_PI_ID
SELECT DISTINCT pi2.PI_NAME as processName FROM PROCESS_INFO pi2 JOIN QUALITY_INSPECTION qi ON pi2.PI_ID = qi.QI_PI_ID
SELECT DISTINCT qs.QS_DF_DIV1 as qsDiv1 FROM QUALITY_STANDARD qs JOIN QUALITY_INSPECTION qi ON qi.QI_QS_ID = qs.QS_ID WHERE qi.QI_PI_ID IS NOT NULL
SELECT DISTINCT qs.QS_DF_DIV2 AS qsDiv2 FROM QUALITY_STANDARD qs WHERE QS_DF_DIV1 = #{qsDiv1}
SELECT DISTINCT qi.QI_WORK_ID as workID FROM QUALITY_INSPECTION qi WHERE qi.QI_WORK_ID IS NOT NULL

SELECT DISTINCT mi.MI_ID as machineID FROM MACHINE_INFO mi JOIN PROCESS_INFO pi ON mi.MI_ID = pi.PI_MACHINE_ID JOIN QUALITY_INSPECTION qi ON qi.QI_PI_ID = pi.PI_ID WHERE mi.MI_ID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY mi.MI_ID

SELECT qs.QS_DF_DIV1 AS qsDiv1 FROM QUALITY_STANDARD qs INNER JOIN ( SELECT MIN(QS_ID) AS MinQS_ID, QS_DF_DIV1 FROM QUALITY_STANDARD GROUP BY QS_DF_DIV1 ) grouped_qs ON qs.QS_ID = grouped_qs.MinQS_ID ORDER BY qs.QS_ID ASC
SELECT DISTINCT qs.QS_DF_DIV2 AS qsDiv2 FROM QUALITY_STANDARD qs WHERE QS_DF_DIV1 = #{qsDiv1}
SELECT w.W_ID FROM WORK w WHERE w.W_DFT_QUANTITY = 0 AND w.W_STATUS = '작업종료' ORDER BY w.W_ID

SELECT w.W_PI_ID AS processID, pi.PI_NAME AS processName, mi.MI_ID AS machineID, w.W_LOT_ID AS lotID, w.W_ITEM_QUANTITY AS dailyWorkQuantity, ct.CT_UNIT AS unit FROM WORK w JOIN PROCESS_INFO pi ON w.W_PI_ID = pi.PI_ID LEFT JOIN MACHINE_INFO mi ON mi.MI_ID = ( SELECT MIN(mi2.MI_ID) FROM MACHINE_INFO mi2 JOIN PROCESS_INFO pi2 ON mi2.MI_ID = pi2.PI_MACHINE_ID WHERE pi2.PI_ID = w.W_PI_ID ) JOIN INSTRUCTION ins ON ins.INS_LOT_ID = w.W_LOT_ID JOIN CONTRACT ct ON ct.CT_ID = ins.INS_CT_ID WHERE w.W_ID = #{workID} GROUP BY w.W_PI_ID, pi.PI_NAME, mi.MI_ID, w.W_LOT_ID, w.W_ITEM_QUANTITY, ct.CT_UNIT

SELECT qs.QS_DF_DIV1 AS qsDiv1 FROM QUALITY_STANDARD qs INNER JOIN ( SELECT MIN(QS_ID) AS MinQS_ID, QS_DF_DIV1 FROM QUALITY_STANDARD GROUP BY QS_DF_DIV1 ) grouped_qs ON qs.QS_ID = grouped_qs.MinQS_ID ORDER BY qs.QS_ID ASC
SELECT DISTINCT qs.QS_DF_DIV2 AS qsDiv2 FROM QUALITY_STANDARD qs WHERE QS_DF_DIV1 = #{qsDiv1}

SELECT DISTINCT qi.QI_WORK_ID as workID , qi.QI_PI_ID as processID , PI2.PI_NAME as processName , qi.QI_PRO_LOT_ID as lotID , pi2.PI_MACHINE_ID as machineID , ct.CT_UNIT as unit , w.W_ITEM_QUANTITY as dailyWorkQuantity , qi.QI_INSPECTION_QUANTITY as inspectionQuantity , qi.QI_DFT_QUANTITY as defectQuantity , qs.QS_DF_DIV1 as qsDiv1 , qs.QS_DF_DIV2 as qsDiv2 , qi.QI_NOTE as note FROM QUALITY_INSPECTION qi JOIN PROCESS_INFO pi2 ON pi2.PI_ID = qi.QI_PI_ID JOIN "WORK" w ON w.W_ID = qi.QI_WORK_ID JOIN QUALITY_STANDARD qs ON qs.QS_ID = qi.QI_QS_ID JOIN INSTRUCTION i ON i.INS_LOT_ID = w.W_LOT_ID JOIN CONTRACT ct ON ct.CT_ID = i.INS_CT_ID WHERE qi.QI_ID = #{qiID}
